title: They Stole It (6R46)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Gollum
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support arear Skirmish: Spot Gollum and discard 3 cards from hand to wound a companion Gollum is skirmishing once (or twice if that companion is a [Shire] companion).
Lore:	”'Where iss it, where iss it: my precious….'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Game text is a clarification.
